channel.title: How do you edit the buy option?
channel.description: How do you change the 10, to a 50? Do you just find the number and change it to a 50 or is it a bit harder than that? Im not looking to change the "10" that the actual game shows. I want it to be like "dsspeeced" or some server like that.

item.title: How do you edit the buy option?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

It’s the code under packet 129 in the parseIncomingPackets method.
Just find the case for it in the switch statement and call the buyItem method with the amount as 50 instead of 10.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you edit the buy option?

item.title: How do you edit the buy option?
item.dc:creator: @uno_da_cat uno_da_cat
item.description:
@uno_da_cat wrote:

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount shop = 1 Pk_Point_Exchange 2 2 shop = 2 Aubury's_Rune_Store 2 2 554 50000 555 50000 556 50000 557 50000 559 50000 558 50000 562 50000 560 50000 553 50000 shop = 3 Ranging_Armor_Shop 2 2 3749 500 1065 500 1099 500 1135 500 2487 500 2493 500 2499 500 2489 500 2495 500 2501 500 2491 500 2497 500 2503 500
Umm mine doesnt seem to have whatever ur talking about
Example please?

Incase ur not sure what im doing, Im trying to make it where you buy 50 at one click.
